name: OC-KFD
paper: Kernel Fisher Discriminants for Outlier Detection.
description: One-class kernel Fisher discriminant classifier (OC-KFD) for outlier detection. Objects that have an unexpected high Mahalanobis distance to the sample mean are considered as atypical objects, or outliers.
